resources.string: FridgeTracker is a simple yet smart application for managing food in a fridge or freezer. It enables expiration tracking, shopping list creation, storage organization, and an overview of available items.
â€¢ Expanded set of food icons
â€¢ Shared storages across multiple users
â€¢ Barcode scanning with database integration
â€¢ Custom food icon using a photo
â€¢ AI prompt builder (suggestions across storages)
Development is currently focused on enabling custom food photos to be used as icons.
